definition: frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream

sentences.english: Moisturizer is the key to soft, supple skin in winter.
sentences.chinese: 在冬季，润肤霜是保持皮肤柔软细滑的密钥。

sentences.english: You can try using a moisturizer or cream -- or wearing long-sleeved shirts.
sentences.chinese: 使用润肤霜，精华霜，或者干脆穿长袖吧。

sentences.english: So what exactly is a "good" moisturizer?
sentences.chinese: 究竟怎么样才是一种“品质好的”润肤霜呢？

sentences.english: For best results, use after cleansing with Alpha Keri Cream Cleanser Intensive.
sentences.chinese: 为达到最佳效果，在洁面后使用润肤霜。

sentences.english: A moisturiser will help temporarily smooth away some early fine lines.
sentences.chinese: 润肤霜会有助于暂时抚平一些早期细纹。
尝试使用玉兰油Definity颜色收复润肤霜。

sentences.english: Can choose special spats frost or you dote on keep wet skin white.
sentences.chinese: 可选用专用护脚霜或者你钟爱的保湿润肤霜。

sentences.english: Pure almond oil is an excellent source of natural moisturizing agents.
sentences.chinese: 纯杏仁油是一个很好的自然润肤霜。

sentences.english: The type of moisturizers you use depend on the current conditions of your skin.
sentences.chinese: 你使用的润肤霜类型由你现在的皮肤条件而定的。

sentences.english: Tweezers were the most popular item that men borrowed, followed closely by moisturizers.
sentences.chinese: 镊子是男人最常借用的物件，润肤霜紧随其后。

sentences.english: The moisture cream was confected using promote permeation function of volatile oil of Ledum.
sentences.chinese: 利用杜香挥发油的促渗作用，配制了保湿润肤霜。

sentences.english: Moisturizer is much more effective on properly exfoliated skin.
sentences.chinese: 润肤霜对差不多要剥落的肌肤层更为有效。

sentences.english: Tender and lovely skin, as white as polished jade, depends on moisturizing cream.
sentences.chinese: 洁白如玉的娇嫩肌肤源于常用润肤霜。
